abstract: ABC remained No. 1 in the ratings on Monday thanks to consistently solid audiences for “Dancing With the Stars” and “Samantha Who.”
snippet: ABC remained No. 1 in the ratings on Monday thanks to consistently solid audiences for “Dancing With the Stars” and “Samantha Who.”
lead_paragraph: ABC remained No. 1 in the ratings on Monday thanks to consistently solid audiences for “Dancing With the Stars” and “Samantha Who.” According to Nielsen’s estimates, the celebrity dancing competition earned the night’s top ratings as usual with an average of 21.8 million viewers from 8 to 9:30 p.m. Following it, ABC’s “Samantha Who,” with Christina Applegate, drew 14.3 million, just shy of that series’ largest audience to date.
